name: Dead Ghouls Web
description:
Dead Ghouls but in your browser

Controls:
wasd - move
q e - switch weapon to turret
r - reload
"Space" - jump/bhop
"Left click" to shoot
"Right click" to fire grenade
"Escape" for pause menu

Fight waves of spooky ghouls ..How long will you last?! Made as a part of 7DFPS

If you enjoyed playing this game give me a shout on my twitter: https://twitter.com/JamesDornanDev 

Thank you for playing! it was fun making this :D 

Extra credit: Main title music "The Asylum" by Sara Afonso You can find her here http://www.saraafonso.com . (she does awesome music!)
